marry.title: You made an offer
marry.description: {user}, would you accept a marriage proposal from {author}

embeds.no_description: {author}, alas... You were denied, don't despair, you will find your love!
embeds.yes_description: {author} and {member} became a couple on the server! Congratulations! They are expecting gifts from guests <:momiji_bunny:1129449787754823750>

errors.member_married: This person is already married. No need to lead him on the path of infidelity, I think?
errors.author_married: You're already married and I don't approve of cheating!
errors.not_role: Role for marriage has not been set.
